title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Amb. Bashir Mohammed Basha

content.rendered: The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Amb. Bashir Mohammed Basha, Chargé D’Affaires from our Mission in Berlin, Germany today 16th July, 2024. There was a presentation of a returned 1897 Benin Bronze Artifact initially in the hands of a private collector. A major milestone in the quest for the return of all artifacts with historical significance that were unduly taken from Nigeria years ago.
